reviews.text:
The Sardana is a dance performed by the Catalonia community, people join hands and dance in a circle while keeping time to drum taps. It is the national dance and performed by dancers holding raised hands, as the dance progresses the circle is enlarged by more people joining.
This statue consists of four couples, male/female alternating, in a circle and holding raised hands. It was created in 1966 and shows the dancers in traditional dress. The entire monument is white colour
